hello.intro:
The [Hampton Classic Horse Show](https://www.hamptonclassic.com/horse-show) returns August 23–30, 2026, centered at the storied [Hampton Classic Horse Show](https://www.hamptonclassic.com/) grounds in Bridgehampton, NY. Expect a polished grand-prix atmosphere with boutique shopping and a lively vendor-village feel, plus classic grass-footing vibes around the main-ring. Keep eyes on ring-flow, warm-up-ring timing, and that fast jog-strip between classes.

Bridgehampton hums in late-summer light: salt air off the Atlantic, cedar shingles, and slow roll village mornings before the rings heat up. Beaches and harbor strolls reset energy between rounds.
hello.outro: Keep the week simple and sport-forward. I can book lodging, map one barn dinner, and prep essentials so you walk into Hampton Classic Horse Show ready to ride.

stay.title: Where to Stay
stay.paragraph: Base close and keep mornings calm at **[Topping Rose House](https://www.toppingrosehouse.com)** or retreat to cottage-style quiet at **[The Roundtree](https://www.theroundtreehotels.com)**. For harbor views, **[Baron’s Cove](https://www.caperesorts.com/barons-cove)** stays easy and walkable in Sag Harbor, while **[Southampton Inn](https://www.southamptoninn.com)** delivers practical comfort in the village.
stay.cta: I’ll book close-in rooms so mornings stay simple.

dine.title: Dine
dine.am: Kick off early at **[Espresso Da Asporto](https://www.espressodaasporto.com)** for fast coffee and breakfast sandwiches, or sit down for upscale plates at **[Topping Rose House Restaurant](https://www.toppingrosehouse.com/dining)** before schooling.
dine.dinner: Post-round, keep it close with casual pies and salads at **[World Pie](https://www.worldpiebh.com)**, or go farm-to-table at **[Page at 63 Main](https://www.page63main.com)**. Crew wants a bistro standby? **[Almond Restaurant](https://www.almondrestaurant.com)** works for varied appetites; for a polished night, reserve **[Topping Rose House Restaurant](https://www.toppingrosehouse.com/dining)**.
dine.cta: I’ll map a barn-friendly dinner loop with quick reservations.

locale.title: Locale — Off-Barn
locale.paragraph: Reset with a Sag Harbor harbor stroll, quick Atlantic beach walks, or a low-key browse through Bridgehampton boutiques between rounds. Short drives keep resets efficient without draining ring focus.

essentials.title: Essentials
essentials.paragraph: Stock the barn from **[King Kullen](https://www.kingkullen.com)** and fill scripts at **[CVS Pharmacy](https://www.cvs.com)**. For horse needs, **[Hampton Feed & Tack](https://hamptonfeedtack.com)** covers feed and bedding. Wheels handled via **[Enterprise Rent-A-Car](https://www.enterprise.com)**, and carts delivered by **[Dever, Inc.](https://www.deverinc.com)**.
essentials.cta: I’ll pack a lean kit so nothing slows your rounds.
